- Async processing

WHERE id = bookingId AND userId = userId alt Booking Non TrouvÃ© âŒ PG-->>Payment: null Payment-->>CN: 404 Not Found
{error: "Booking not found"} CN-->>WC: 404 Error WC->>User: âŒ Erreur rÃ©servation else Booking TrouvÃ© âœ… PG-->>Payment: Booking found Payment->>Stripe: Create PaymentIntent
POST /v1/payment_intents

currency: "eur",
metadata: {bookingId}} Stripe-->>Payment: PaymentIntent created
{id: "pi_...",

amount, status: "PENDING"} Payment->>Kafka: Publish event

{clientSecret, paymentIntentId} CN-->>WC: 200 OK end end rect rgb(255, 245, 245) Note over WC,Stripe: Phase 4: Paiement Stripe (Frontend) WC->>WC: Initialize Stripe.js
with clientSecret WC->>User: Affiche formulaire carte
(Stripe Elements) User->>WC: Saisit infos carte
(numÃ©ro, CVC, expiration) WC->>Stripe: POST /v1/payment_intents/:id/confirm
(via Stripe.js)
{payment_method: "pm_..."} Note right of Stripe: ğŸ”’ SÃ©curitÃ© PCI-DSS
- Carte jamais envoyÃ©e Ã  notre backend

(insufficient_funds) WC->>User: âŒ "Paiement refusÃ©"
(fonds insuffisants) end end rect rgb(245, 245, 255) Note over Stripe,Kafka: Phase 5: Webhook Stripe (Backend) Stripe->>Payment: POST /webhooks/stripe
Stripe-Signature header
{type: "payment_intent.succeeded",
data: {paymentIntentId}} Payment->>Payment: Verify signature

{status: "CONFIRMED"} CN-->>WC: 200 OK WC->>WC: Stop polling WC->>WC: Redirect /bookings/:id WC->>User: âœ… Affiche confirmation
+ dÃ©tails voyage else Status = PENDING â³ PG-->>Voyage: Booking still pending Voyage-->>CN: 200 OK
{status: "PENDING"} CN-->>WC: 200 OK (continue polling) Note right of WC: â±ï¸ AprÃ¨s 15min
rÃ©servation annulÃ©e
automatiquement end end end Note over User,Kafka: ğŸ“Š Performance RÃ©servation
